  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerSprite

      public PlayerSprite​(Spritesheet spritesheet, int[] bodyModel, int[] pants, int[] shoes, int[] top, int[] head)
      Constructs new PlayerSprite with given parameters and builds it as a new Sprite
      Parameters:
      spritesheet - Spritesheet as reference for the other parameters
      bodyModel - int[x, y] Values for Body Model referencing Spritesheet X and Y counter from top left, starting with 0
      pants - int[x, y] Values for Pants referencing Spritesheet X and Y counter from top left, starting with 0
      shoes - int[x, y] Values for Shoes referencing Spritesheet X and Y counter from top left, starting with 0
      top - int[x, y] Values for Top referencing Spritesheet X and Y counter from top left, starting with 0
      head - int[x, y] Values for Head referencing Spritesheet X and Y counter from top left, starting with 0
